author: Special Correspondent
text:
C. Sakthivel (28) of Kattathur near Jayamkondam Wednesday committed suicide by hanging from a branch of a tree at Kalleri village after burning his wife and two others.

He had allegedly attacked his wife Surya (25), her mother Chithra (42), and her mother Ayya Dhanam (65) with a sickle before taking the extreme step of ending his life.

He poured petrol and set up them on fire before committing suicide.

He is said to have taken the steps suspecting the fidelity of his wife. Besides three of them, Sakthivel sustained burns.

Sources said Sakthivel, who had returned from Singapore recently, managed to save himself by putting out the flame. However, he was found hanging from a tree within a few hours.

All others had been admitted to the Medical College Hospital in Thanjavur on Jayamkondam police have filed a case.
title: Man ends life
